name: Hearse N Hotties (free shipping)

name: From The Grave cd Free shipping
description:
Get it NOW ... The album that started it all . From The Grave . Malaki's first solo record a must have for all Underground Fans. The album features 10 hard hitting tracks that combine rap style lyrical cadence with electronic and metal sounds for a blend Malaki dubbed "Industrial Horrorcore" . Pick up yours NOW and see why this was the album that got the ball rolling .
Track list
1. Intro 2. Open your Eyes 3. Blood Blood Kill Kill 4. Liquid Night (Liquid Fright Mix) 5. Goodie Goodie 6. Monster 7. WarTime 8. Give In 9. I Will 10. Outro

name: The NewBreed CD REMASTERED free shipping
description:
Back again is the Underground classic The NewBreed album from Malaki Macabre .. Fully Remastered versions of all 14 songs Featuring Mars (from Tunnel Runners ) Scum Fury Ill-E-Gal & Qrem Dela Qrem . Also featuring production From LSP producer Fiasco Murder House records Toxik Malaki Macabre & Tunnel Runner Jason Porter ... Be sure to get Your copy today
Track List
1. Intro 2. Malaki Is Coming 3. Underworld 4. Blood N Guts 5. Kreepin 6. Everyday Psycho (feat. Fury & the Lokal) 7. Voices (feat. Hillside Killa & Nnyd) 8. Times Up (feat. Mars) 9. Ghost Shots 10. Pure Evil (feat. Scum & Qrem Dela Qrem) 11. Gather Round 12. Fight Music (feat. Ill-e-gal) 13. Kill 4 the Demon 14. Times Up - Jason Porter Remix (feat. Mars)

name: Malaki Macabre Presents the " Injecticidal " EP
description: Malaki Macabre's 3rd release the " Injecticidal EP " is finally here . With this album Malaki takes it back to the ( From the Grave) era and again combines the synth based metal riff driven music with distorted rap style vocals. All tracks have been Fully Mastered to crank the HARDEST they can for your listening pleasure. This album is a MUST HAVE for any Malaki fan or Underground Supporter get yours NOW.
